attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government recently unveiled proposals to create a new information database. 

If the Data Communications Bill is passed they will be able to access and store details of every phone call made, text message and e-mail sent and website visited by everyone on the UK without any prior clearance.

This is another step to create a Big Brother state under the guise of 'stopping terrorism'. We are British citizens not the Taliban and have our right to privacy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
